alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chester; Crockett; Gibson; Hardeman; Haywood; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 6:24PM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Crockett County in western Tennessee... Northern Henderson County in western Tennessee... Southeastern Gibson County in western Tennessee... North central Hardeman County in western Tennessee... Southwestern Carroll County in western Tennessee... East central Haywood County in western Tennessee... Madison County in western Tennessee... Northwestern Chester County in western Tennessee... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bemis, or near Jackson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, Lexington, Fairview, Three Way, Bradford, Atwood, Blue Goose, Mifflin, Bargerton, Bemis, Adair, Mercer, Darden, Cloverport, Parkers Crossroads, Carroll, Medina and Gadsden. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Chester; Crockett; Gibson; Hardeman; Haywood; Henderson; Madison
